articles.description: Live radio and text coverage as Slovenia face Northern Ireland in Group H of the 2024 Uefa European Championship qualifiers.

articles.description: Follow live radio & text commentary as Wales welcome South Korea in an international friendly at the Cardiff City Stadium.
articles.title: International friendly: Wales 0-0 South Korea - radio & text

articles.description: Alex Mitchell and Jonny May will start for England in their Rugby World Cup opener against Argentina despite initially missing out on the 33-man squad.
articles.title: England pick Mitchell and May to face Argentina

articles.description: Wales number eight Taulupe Faletau will start against Fiji in the Rugby World Cup opening game in Bordeaux on Sunday.
articles.title: Faletau fit for Wales' World Cup opener against Fiji

articles.description: Ben Stokes says there is a "very good plan in place" to attempt to fix the long-term problem with his left knee.
articles.title: Stokes has 'very good plan' for knee injury

articles.description: Coco Gauff plays Karolina Muchova in Thursday's US Open women's semi-finals, followed by Aryna Sabalenka against Madison Keys.
articles.title: Will Gauff and Sabalenka be stopped at US Open?

articles.description: WBC heavyweight champion Tyson Fury says he'll be "disappointed if there's not war" in his fight with former UFC heavyweight champion Francis Ngannou in October.
articles.title: 'I'll be disappointed if it's not war' - Fury

articles.description: On the eve of the tournament's start, a finely balanced set of favourites raise expectations of perhaps the best Rugby World Cup yet.
articles.title: 'A teetering World Cup poised to thrill'

articles.description: Live text updates as France host the Republic of Ireland in Group B of the 2024 Uefa European Championship qualifiers.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifiers: France in front against Republic of Ireland

articles.description: Johnny Sexton gets the nod for his first appearance since March as he is named in Ireland's team for Saturday's World Cup opener against Romania.
articles.title: Sexton to start Ireland's Romania World Cup opener
